Reviews.Title: Awesome Phone
Reviews.Author: gas2010
Reviews.Content: Great, phone. LOVE IT. works great, no problems at all. Looks great and has not given any issues with it at all.

Reviews.Title: Frustrating fact
Reviews.Author: Bright
Reviews.Content: This phone is not unlocked it would not work with my gsm I'm thinking about returning it unless there is an unlocked one up for replacement.

Reviews.Title: Dual-core doesn't do it for me
Reviews.Author: Melissa Point
Reviews.Content: When connected to Bluetooth the song gets broken up when the phone is processing something else. It's like the "dual-core" can't process everything very well.

Reviews.Title: concern buyer
Reviews.Author: Tisha
Reviews.Content: I would like to know if this phone can use sim card. Cause i see no information concerning that description.
